Actions.Text: REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT

Title: Requires certain safety devices at public boat launches
Summary: Requires owners of public boat launches to maintain at least one ring buoy or life preserver and a life-belt device on the premises.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the navigation law, in relation to requiring certain safety devices at public boat launches
